title: This is not what they expected from the prom. Parents from Krakow are shaking their heads
description: A gym decorated with balloons and homemade cakes - such proms are a thing of the past. Now, high school graduates party in elegant hotels. They walk on red carpets, enjoy chocolate fountains, and "check off" their cosmetic bags before the party. However, not all parents can afford such expenses. "Dziennik Polski" showed the rates from Krakow - here we are not talking about hundreds, but thousands. It is fair to add that prom prices are attacking all over Poland.

title: Urgent changes after high-profile accident: "The state must act quickly and ruthlessly"
description: After a 14-year-old boy was fatally hit by a driver with a court-ordered driving ban, the government is announcing urgent changes to the license verification system. "The state must act quickly and ruthlessly," emphasized Digital Affairs Minister Krzysztof Gawkowski on Tuesday. He announced that by the end of the month, CEPiK "will be automated and accessible to entrepreneurs in an easy and clear way."

title: She was driving when a block of ice hit her in the face. Drama on the route near Garwolin
description: It was a close call to tragedy! A block of ice from a truck fell onto an oncoming passenger car and broke through the window. The passenger suffered a head injury and was taken to hospital.

title: These are the two darkest places in Poland. They are an extraordinary tourist attraction.
description: A night sky full of stars is becoming a rarity in today's world. Artificial light has taken over our cities. As many as 83% of people in the world, including almost all residents of Europe and America, have lost the opportunity to admire the pure, starry abyss that opens above our heads after dark. That's 4.5 billion people! However, there are still places in Poland where you can observe an extraordinary night spectacle. These are the so-called dark sky parks.

title: This town on Spitsbergen has been gone for 27 years, but it still intrigues. "A backdrop for disaster movies"
description: Ghost towns are scattered all over the world, but the northernmost one makes an especially powerful impression. The pyramid on Spitsbergen is a monument to a bygone era. When people disappeared from it in the 1990s, birds took over the buildings. And then tourists showed up to see the end of the world – both geographical and historical. What I saw in the Pyramid were mostly everyday objects. They are stuck in their places as if they were still waiting for their owners.

title: A new way to calculate your pension. ZUS will wait only six months for your application
description: This year, a new method of recalculating pensions will be available. It will be available to up to 100,000 people who lost out by retiring in June in the years 2009-2019. To benefit from the recalculation, you will need to submit an application. ZUS is to accept them from July to December.

title: The city has its own gas station. Prices may surprise you positively
description: In January 2024, Chełm launched its first city gas station. It was a pioneering idea that aimed to reduce fuel prices in the city and stimulate competition on the market. After a year of operation, the city's president Jakub Banaszek boasts of success - fuel prices in Chełm have dropped by as much as 20-30 groszy per liter.

title: The end of a shocking robbery at a gas station in Marki. The perpetrators have been arrested
description: A pre-holiday robbery at an LPG gas station in Marki ended with the perpetrators being arrested. Police officers from Wołomin, after intensive operational work, arrested two men suspected of a brutal robbery.

title: Changes after fatal hit-and-run of 14-year-old. "Quick and ruthless"
description: Already in January, companies involved in freight transport or passenger transport will be able to check more easily whether their employees have valid driving licenses. As reported by Radio ZET, the Ministry of Digital Affairs will provide a new tool that will allow companies to automatically access data from the Central Register of Vehicles and Drivers (CEPIK).

title: Nawałka back as a coach. Is he already sending out call-ups? Grosicki is on the list
description: Adam Nawałka is set to return to coaching in surprising circumstances. As reported by "Meczyki", the former Polish national team coach will play a key role in the blockbuster all-star match. Ronaldinho, among others, is set to appear in our country.

title: He was released from prison in December. After the New Year, he ended up back behind bars.
description: Dramatic events took place in Iława. A 41-year-old man, recently released from prison, again abused his family. Under the influence of alcohol, he attacked his wife, which resulted in his re-arrest.

title: A touching moment in Michał Milowicz's life. This is how he finds out the gender of his child
description: In mid-December 2024, Michał Milowicz shared some happy news with the world. It turns out that the 54-year-old actor will soon become a father! The mother of his child is his partner Katarzyna Kędzierska, who is 13 years younger than him. The couple showed a cute video in which they learn from the test results what gender the baby will be.

title: Krzysztof Cugowski on Beata Kozidrak's return to health. "There were different prognoses"
description: On New Year's Day, Beata Kozidrak's social media posted an optimistic message. The artist finally gave her fans some good news about her health. This pleased not only her fans, but also Krzysztof Cugowski. - Thank God - said the legendary vocalist, who has been friends with Beata Kozidrak for four decades, in an interview with "Fakt".

title: Karolina Pajączkowska is devastated: I lost my car and I will lose money
description: It was supposed to be a quiet Sunday drive. Karolina Pajączkowska was on her way to pick up her son when a police car unexpectedly hit her. The famous journalist has a wrecked car that she was just finishing paying off. I was supposed to sell it, now I won't get the money for it that I expected — the former TVP star tells us.

title: Ilona Łepkowska reveals the secrets of her work. The queen of Polish series admits: I can swear
description: Thanks to her, viewers have been following the fates of beloved characters in several series for years. Ilona Łepkowska has created hundreds of characters, invented their adventures and made a whole host of actors famous. In an interview with "Fakt", the scriptwriter talks about her work, reveals who she has the greatest weakness for and what it's like to kill off series characters. She also confessed what she thinks about the Mroczek brothers and Katarzyna Cichopek, who grew up on her series sets.

title: Horrific Death of 14-Year-Old. Accusations Against Government Appear
description: It is impossible to come to terms with the tragic death of a 14-year-old in Warsaw's Wola district. The boy, who had his whole life ahead of him, was brutally hit by a bus driver. The aftermath of the tragedy is another announcement of changes to the law. And it is these changes that have divided politicians. - This perpetrator could be tried under the "road murder" section and given an appropriate punishment, but unfortunately this will not happen due to the stubbornness of the current government and the rejection of all our projects - PiS MP Rafał Weber accuses in "Fakt".

title: Firefighters rescued a doe. Residents in shock. "They sentenced her to death in agony"
description: They were called to help, and according to witnesses, they contributed to the suffering of a defenseless animal. Firefighters from Nowa Ruda (Lower Silesia Province) were pulling a weakened doe from the river. "They left it to its fate and sentenced it to death in agony," describes Mr. Jakub, who had been watching the firefighters' action from the beginning.

title: Thurnbichler's harsh words about Żyła: Piotrek cut himself
description: The winner of the Four Hills Tournament was the Austrian Daniel Tschofenig, and the best of the Poles, Paweł Wąsek, took eighth place. The rest of our competitors did much worse. Their performance was severely assessed by the national team coach Thomas Thurnbichler. Piotr Żyła received the most punishment.

title: "Lex Romanowski" will go to the Sejm. Hołownia announces further steps
description: Szymon Hołownia informed that the Sejm will deal with the "lex Romanowski" project at the next session. However, he announced that he will not put pressure on the deputies to proceed with the amendment to the act as quickly as possible. "There is no rush here," the Sejm Speaker assured on Tuesday. On the same day, the court set a date for a hearing during which it will consider the appeal against the three-month arrest of the PiS MP.

title: Where to Throw Away Old or Damaged Christmas Ornaments? Be Careful Not to Get a Ticket!
description: Christmas, New Year and Epiphany are behind us. Although many people have already managed to get rid of their Christmas trees, some homes still have live or artificial trees, and with them — Christmas decorations. What to do with them?

title: Trump Officially Declared Winner. What's in Store for America in the Week Ahead?
description: Four years after the storming of the Capitol, this time the certification of the presidential election result in the US went smoothly. It was a moment of calm before the approaching rule of Donald Trump.

title: "Necessary Things": a film that tells, among other things, how post-traumatic stress works in the family
description: Kamila Tarabura's film is one of the best Polish debuts of recent years, based on a famous report. It tests our ideas about how a wronged person should not behave.

title: Guantanamo Bay Prison Writes Its Final Chapter
description: The most notorious American prison in Guantanamo is slowly emptying out. Several of the last prisoners were released at the end of the year, and three of the most important will be sentenced this year.

title: Belgium is the first country in the EU to ban e-cigarettes. The Polish government is the only one leading in announcements.
description: Belgium is an EU leader in restricting access to tobacco products. Let it become a model for Polish legislators.

title: Russian Holidays at War. What are Santa Claus's combat abilities?
description: Father Frost shooting at Santa Claus – Russian propaganda has never played this before. Although it plays various outrageous and false pieces on a daily basis. This time, even the Christmas message has been militarized.

title: New Year's Resolutions: How to Persevere? School of Feelings with Bogdan de Barbaro – Special Episode
description: Is there a way to persevere in your resolution to change? How to regain a sense of agency? What to do when life is getting out of control? When is failure the best teacher? To what extent do people have influence over their own lives? | Episode especially for Tygodnik subscribers.

title: Will We Be Happy in the 21st Century? [Yet Another Future Episode 15]
description: You've probably heard of global happiness rankings? But did you know that the two most popular ones seem to say the exact opposite? How do you actually measure happiness?

title: Traditionalists vs. Billionaires: Who Will Win the Battle for Access to Trump?
description: Although Donald Trump will not take office for another three weeks, members of the rival factions in his camp have just begun spectacularly throwing mud at each other. The spark that ignited the storm was the nomination of a member of the new US president’s administration.

title: The National Electoral Commission has made a decision: PiS will receive subsidy money after all. What will Tusk do now?
description: The decision of the National Electoral Commission is right, even if Kaczyński's party broke the law. Thanks to it, we avoided extremely serious consequences that could have destroyed Polish democracy.

title: Half a century ago, the Rubik's Cube was created. What is its phenomenon?
description: Ernő Rubik Jr. estimates that over a billion people have held his cube in their hands, trying to solve it. Over 500 million pieces have been sold. Officially, because fakes were produced in many countries. How did the "magic cube" conquer the world? Our author met its creator.

title: Canada Takes a Course in the Law: The World's Favorite Country Is Tired of Justin Trudeau and Being Nice to Everyone
description: After 10 years of liberal Justin Trudeau, most Canadians are fed up. They want not only a change of prime minister but also new policies. Many feel that the Canadian Dream that once made their country so attractive has ended.

title: Patron of the Year 2025: Stefan Żeromski asks questions about culture
description: Stefan Żeromski was among the crowd of patrons of the year 2025 established by the Sejm and Senate. However, few people remember that this year also marks the hundredth anniversary of the premiere of his most famous drama, "My Little Quail Ran Away". What did this drama say then, and what does it say to us and about us today?

title: In Rome they are experimenting with the parish of the future
description: A priest with a wife and children and a professional job is closer to the life experiences of the parishioners. We present an experimental parish.

title: Liturgical readings (5-19 January)
Goodbye
We have become so accustomed to the idea that if life has torn siblings apart, it will eventually bring them back together. Why tell such a story any differently?
description: The children grew and developed healthily and evenly, but with time the girl began to overtake the boy, who became apathetic, withdrawn and had problems with school. The girl helped her brother as much as she could, but when it came to choosing a secondary school, the parents decided to separate them...

title: Did the Three Kings Really Exist? It Doesn't Matter
description: This eternal, mad desire to penetrate into the interior of everything that exists makes us, like the evangelical Magi-Wise Men, whether we know it or not, go into the unknown in search of the "newborn king".

title: Krzysztof Zalewski, singer: I have moments when I don't think about anything. I'm just a transmitter of energy
description: I have been assigned this role in life: a bit of a host, a bit of a shaman. At my concerts I want to enchant people so that they come out of them at least a little differently.

title: My two wishes for the new year
description: Our daily experience is fear, unpredictability of tomorrow, discouragement, skepticism, pessimism. How to maintain hope?

title: Bible translators and twin pregnancy
description: Today we will talk about some twins key to both Jewish and Christian genealogy.

title: Book of the week: conversations between Piotr Kłoczowski and Józef Czapski
description: It is wonderful that these conversations were recorded and written down. Piotr Kłoczowski skillfully evokes subsequent threads, and the reader feels as if he were sitting somewhere off to the side in a room on the first floor of a house in Maisons-Laffitte, listening to Józef Czapski, who is now almost completely blind.

title: Kate Winslet: One Oscar Is Not Enough
description: One of the best actresses of our time has waited a long time for full recognition. Instead, she has proven time and again that her acting is above Oscar-winning performances.

title: What's hidden in the white napkin? Do you remember this scene from the movie "Bouillon and Other Passions"?
description: This custom has a practical dimension – so as not to lose the aroma, not to spray one's companions – and, so I heard, a moral one: the buntings want to hide this infamous ritual from people, and maybe even God.

title: Celebrities like us: teaching us to love, eat and live. And what do we say about it?
description: When we say that celebrities are "detached from reality," we rarely mean extreme situations, such as belief in reptilians or the belief that glaciers are doing great. We usually mean their tendency to universalize their own experiences and forget about the social and living arrangements.

title: Franz Kafka: One Hundred Years of Our Solitude
description: A hundred years have passed since Kafka's death, and we are still trying to fathom his incomprehensible personality and dazzling style. He discovered a world of superfluous and insignificant people with whom the twentieth century has populated societies. There are countless millions of them today.

title: Bartosz Minkiewicz Draws
Where did belief in God come from and what form will it take in the age of AI?
description: Reza Aslan, religious scholar: Religion is not anti-scientific. Whoever thinks so is ignorant. Religion constantly adapts to our understanding of the nature of reality.

title: Black Sea training ground of Europe. Bulgaria, Moldova and Romania will play an important role in 2025
description: When European politicians try to understand the phenomenon of Russian influence today, they focus mainly on the tools: TikTok and disinformation. Meanwhile, the examples of Bulgaria, Moldova and Romania show that local elites are also working there – albeit unintentionally – for the Kremlin's success. Does this region highlight the pains of the whole of Europe?

title: Kłodzko Valley after the September flood. From a human perspective, almost everything has changed
description: He doesn't care, because he definitely won't be coming back. It will be hard for him to say goodbye to this place, but it would be even harder to stay. "I am like this house," he says, pointing to a building without a gable wall, revealing what should remain hidden.

title: Polish army: with modern equipment and without ammunition
description: The Polish army is equipped with more and more modern weapons. It is still not known what the army will shoot with this equipment.

title: Challenges of 2025. What will happen in Polish politics?
description: In PiS and Konfederacja they rub their hands with glee, encouraging the left to become as radical as possible, because it plays to their advantage and breaks up the ruling camp. In this context, the fact that Trzaskowski has lowered his tone is reasonable, says sociologist Jarosław Flis.

title: Medjugorje and Other Apparitions: Has the Vatican Found a Solution to Supernatural Phenomena?
description: The Vatican has used a ploy to deal with a series of strange cases that it has so far not quite known what to do with.

title: Poland is friendly. So what is our problem with smiling?
description: The real challenge for the new year? We can either divide ourselves into the smiling and the bitter, or we can unite the country with a smile of kindness. The kind that appears even when things are bad. And that has no political color. There is research to prove it.

title: The Twilight of Democracy: Why Is Silicon Valley Hanging Out with Trump?
description: As we approach 2025, anti-democratic ideas, Cold War militarism, and eugenics are pouring out of Silicon Valley. Why?

title: Happy New Year, or How to Make Thoughtful Wishes
description: We usually say, perhaps from the heart, a few platitudes. But there are always some things that should be included in the wishes. Let's not disregard this.

title: To the points
Is Luigi Mangione really a hero?
description: A political enemy who kills one of our own is a degenerate and a murderer, but our own brother who does the same is a hero whom we elevate on our banners (or rather T-shirts, mugs and keychains). Be careful!

title: Once Feeding East Africa, Now Starving for Oil. Report from South Sudan
description: Lack of clean water, floods and droughts, civil war: there are enough reasons why this country is at the bottom of the world statistics. Is there any hope for it?

title: Why we don't have flying taxis
description: In the 21st century, we were supposed to have flying cars, cities on the moon and the ocean floor, and robots as servants. The future that came did not fulfill our prophecies. But that says less about the nature of technology and more about ours.

title: Zombie Patients: How Medicine Manufactures Data
description: A thorough investigation suggests that a significant portion of medical publications are based on fabricated data. We pay for scientific fraud with lower efficacy and lower safety of therapies.

title: Spelling, a difficult love. Reform just around the corner, just around the corner or just around the corner
description: We like our language, we give ourselves fives and sixes in our knowledge of it. We argue about correctness. That is why every spelling reform arouses so many emotions. What will the next one bring?

title: Luigi Mangione Divided America: UnitedHealthcare CEO Assassination Raises Extreme Emotions
description: Few people feel sorry for the victim. The killer, 26-year-old Luigi Mangione, is treated by many Americans as a modern-day Robin Hood. Television talk shows joke that he deserves the title of sexiest killer of the year.

title: New Year's Horoscope: What the Return of Astrology Says About Us
description: Are you looking for a horoscope for the new year? And have you wondered why? What makes astrology – one of the oldest forms of human activity, seemingly compromised by science and modern rationalism – experience a renaissance?

title: What if, or an alternative history of the Third Polish Republic
description: In the history of the Third Polish Republic there were several moments when seemingly insignificant events could have changed our history. If they had happened, perhaps Aleksander Kwaśniewski would not have become president, and PiS and PO would never have been created.

title: The Secret of the Polish Smile: Can We Be Kind to Each Other and Not Smile at Each Other?
description: If, like me, you are tired of attempts to transplant the American culture of smiling to Poland as a strategy for every occasion and of blackmailing with the image of a gloomy Pole, reading the latest issue of the Weekly will bring you relief.

title: How the whole of Poland was looking for Marcin Romanowski
description: We learn about Mr. Romanowski's whereabouts not from the police, but from the Prime Minister of Poland, who was told about it by the Prime Minister of Hungary. He claims that he will not give us Mr. Romanowski. So we will have a government in exile. Because it was announced that many will find shelter in Hungary.

title: Judiciary Crisis: How to Break the Impasse
description: At the threshold of 2025, we have two dimensions of justice: the one recognized by the president and PiS, and the one treated as legal by those in power.

title: Characters 2024: Antoni Dudek
description: Professor Antoni Dudek as a commentator and podcaster helps us understand reality – so as not to be afraid of it.

title: "The Blot and the Invention of Filip Golarz": A Parable of the Mystery
description: The creators of the new adventures of Ambroży Kleks ask key questions about the relationship between faith and reason and the importance of memory. They arise in a world that delegates more and more decisions to machines, including those directly affecting our lives.

title: Tusk's Slalom. Will the coalition leader be able to lead it to victory once again in 2025?
description: Planning is not the prime minister's strong point; he is not the owner of "cabinets full of laws", but rather a master of improvisation, adapting actions to public moods.

title: This is not what they expected from the prom. Parents from Krakow are shaking their heads
description: A gym decorated with balloons and homemade cakes - such proms are a thing of the past. Now, high school graduates party in elegant hotels. They walk on red carpets, enjoy chocolate fountains, and "check off" their cosmetic bags before the party. However, not all parents can afford such expenses. "Dziennik Polski" showed the rates from Krakow - here we are not talking about hundreds, but thousands. It is fair to add that prom prices are attacking all over Poland.

description: You've probably heard of global happiness rankings? But did you know that the two most popular ones seem to say the exact opposite? How do you actually measure happiness?

title: Traditionalists vs. Billionaires: Who Will Win the Battle for Access to Trump?
description: Although Donald Trump will not take office for another three weeks, members of the rival factions in his camp have just begun spectacularly throwing mud at each other. The spark that ignited the storm was the nomination of a member of the new US president’s administration.

title: The National Electoral Commission has made a decision: PiS will receive subsidy money after all. What will Tusk do now?
description: The decision of the National Electoral Commission is right, even if Kaczyński's party broke the law. Thanks to it, we avoided extremely serious consequences that could have destroyed Polish democracy.

title: Half a century ago, the Rubik's Cube was created. What is its phenomenon?
description: Ernő Rubik Jr. estimates that over a billion people have held his cube in their hands, trying to solve it. Over 500 million pieces have been sold. Officially, because fakes were produced in many countries. How did the "magic cube" conquer the world? Our author met its creator.

title: Canada Takes a Course in the Law: The World's Favorite Country Is Tired of Justin Trudeau and Being Nice to Everyone
description: After 10 years of liberal Justin Trudeau, most Canadians are fed up. They want not only a change of prime minister but also new policies. Many feel that the Canadian Dream that once made their country so attractive has ended.

title: Patron of the Year 2025: Stefan Żeromski asks questions about culture
description: Stefan Żeromski was among the crowd of patrons of the year 2025 established by the Sejm and Senate. However, few people remember that this year also marks the hundredth anniversary of the premiere of his most famous drama, "My Little Quail Ran Away". What did this drama say then, and what does it say to us and about us today?

title: In Rome they are experimenting with the parish of the future
description: A priest with a wife and children and a professional job is closer to the life experiences of the parishioners. We present an experimental parish.

title: Liturgical readings (5-19 January)
Goodbye
We have become so accustomed to the idea that if life has torn siblings apart, it will eventually bring them back together. Why tell such a story any differently?
description: The children grew and developed healthily and evenly, but with time the girl began to overtake the boy, who became apathetic, withdrawn and had problems with school. The girl helped her brother as much as she could, but when it came to choosing a secondary school, the parents decided to separate them...

title: Did the Three Kings Really Exist? It Doesn't Matter
description: This eternal, mad desire to penetrate into the interior of everything that exists makes us, like the evangelical Magi-Wise Men, whether we know it or not, go into the unknown in search of the "newborn king".

title: Krzysztof Zalewski, singer: I have moments when I don't think about anything. I'm just a transmitter of energy
description: I have been assigned this role in life: a bit of a host, a bit of a shaman. At my concerts I want to enchant people so that they come out of them at least a little differently.

title: My two wishes for the new year
description: Our daily experience is fear, unpredictability of tomorrow, discouragement, skepticism, pessimism. How to maintain hope?

title: Bible translators and twin pregnancy
description: Today we will talk about some twins key to both Jewish and Christian genealogy.

title: Book of the week: conversations between Piotr Kłoczowski and Józef Czapski
description: It is wonderful that these conversations were recorded and written down. Piotr Kłoczowski skillfully evokes subsequent threads, and the reader feels as if he were sitting somewhere off to the side in a room on the first floor of a house in Maisons-Laffitte, listening to Józef Czapski, who is now almost completely blind.

title: Kate Winslet: One Oscar Is Not Enough
description: One of the best actresses of our time has waited a long time for full recognition. Instead, she has proven time and again that her acting is above Oscar-winning performances.

title: What is hidden in the white napkin? Do you remember this scene from the movie "Bouillon and Other Passions"?
description: This custom has a practical dimension – so as not to lose the aroma, not to spray one's companions – and, so I heard, a moral one: the buntings want to hide this infamous ritual from people, and maybe even God.

title: Celebrities like us: teaching us to love, eat and live. And what do we say about it?
description: When we say that celebrities are "detached from reality," we rarely mean extreme situations, such as belief in reptilians or the belief that glaciers are doing great. We usually mean their tendency to universalize their own experiences and forget about the social and living arrangements.

title: Franz Kafka: Our One Hundred Years of Solitude
description: A hundred years have passed since Kafka's death, and we are still trying to fathom his incomprehensible personality and dazzling style. He discovered a world of superfluous and insignificant people with whom the twentieth century has populated societies. There are countless millions of them today.

title: Bartosz Minkiewicz Draws
Where did belief in God come from and what form will it take in the age of AI?
description: Reza Aslan, religious scholar: Religion is not anti-scientific. Whoever thinks so is ignorant. Religion constantly adapts to our understanding of the nature of reality.

title: Black Sea training ground of Europe. Bulgaria, Moldova and Romania will play an important role in 2025
description: When European politicians try to understand the phenomenon of Russian influence today, they focus mainly on the tools: TikTok and disinformation. Meanwhile, the examples of Bulgaria, Moldova and Romania show that local elites are also working there – albeit unintentionally – for the Kremlin's success. Does this region highlight the pains of the whole of Europe?

title: Kłodzko Valley after the September flood. From a human perspective, almost everything has changed
description: He doesn't care, because he definitely won't be coming back. It will be hard for him to say goodbye to this place, but it would be even harder to stay. "I am like this house," he says, pointing to a building without a gable wall, revealing what should remain hidden.

title: Polish army: with modern equipment and without ammunition
description: The Polish army is equipped with more and more modern weapons. It is still not known what the army will shoot with this equipment.

title: Challenges of 2025. What will happen in Polish politics?
description: In PiS and Konfederacja they rub their hands with glee, encouraging the left to become as radical as possible, because it plays to their advantage and breaks up the ruling camp. In this context, the fact that Trzaskowski has lowered his tone is reasonable, says sociologist Jarosław Flis.

title: Medjugorje and Other Apparitions: Has the Vatican Found a Solution to Supernatural Phenomena?
description: The Vatican has used a ploy to deal with a series of strange cases that it has so far not quite known what to do with.

title: Poland is friendly. So what is our problem with smiling?
description: The real challenge for the new year? We can either divide ourselves into the smiling and the bitter, or we can unite the country with a smile of kindness. The kind that appears even when things are bad. And that has no political color. There is research to prove it.

title: The Twilight of Democracy: Why Is Silicon Valley Hanging Out with Trump?
description: As we approach 2025, anti-democratic ideas, Cold War militarism, and eugenics are pouring out of Silicon Valley. Why?

title: Happy New Year, or How to Make Thoughtful Wishes
description: We usually say, perhaps from the heart, a few platitudes. But there are always some things that should be included in the wishes. Let's not disregard this.

title: To the points
Is Luigi Mangione really a hero?
description: A political enemy who kills one of our own is a degenerate and a murderer, but our own brother who does the same is a hero whom we elevate on our banners (or rather T-shirts, mugs and keychains). Be careful!

title: Once Feeding East Africa, Now Starving for Oil. Report from South Sudan
description: Lack of clean water, floods and droughts, civil war: there are enough reasons why this country is at the bottom of the world statistics. Is there any hope for it?

title: Why we don't have flying taxis
description: In the 21st century, we were supposed to have flying cars, cities on the moon and the ocean floor, and robots as servants. The future that came did not fulfill our prophecies. But that says less about the nature of technology and more about ours.

title: Zombie Patients: How Medicine Manufactures Data
description: A thorough investigation suggests that a significant portion of medical publications are based on fabricated data. We pay for scientific fraud with lower efficacy and lower safety of therapies.

title: Spelling, a difficult love. Reform just around the corner, just around the corner or just around the corner
description: We like our language, we give ourselves fives and sixes in our knowledge of it. We argue about correctness. That is why every spelling reform arouses so many emotions. What will the next one bring?

title: Luigi Mangione Divided America: UnitedHealthcare CEO Assassination Raises Extreme Emotions
description: Few people feel sorry for the victim. The killer, 26-year-old Luigi Mangione, is treated by many Americans as a modern-day Robin Hood. Television talk shows joke that he deserves the title of sexiest killer of the year.

title: New Year's Horoscope: What the Return of Astrology Says About Us
description: Are you looking for a horoscope for the new year? And have you wondered why? What makes astrology – one of the oldest forms of human activity, seemingly compromised by science and modern rationalism – experience a renaissance?

title: What if, or an alternative history of the Third Polish Republic
description: In the history of the Third Polish Republic there were several moments when seemingly insignificant events could have changed our history. If they had happened, perhaps Aleksander Kwaśniewski would not have become president, and PiS and PO would never have been created.

title: The Secret of the Polish Smile: Can We Be Kind to Each Other and Not Smile at Each Other?
description: If, like me, you are tired of attempts to transplant the American culture of smiling to Poland as a strategy for every occasion and of blackmailing with the image of a gloomy Pole, reading the latest issue of the Weekly will bring you relief.

title: How the whole of Poland was looking for Marcin Romanowski
description: We learn about Mr. Romanowski's whereabouts not from the police, but from the Prime Minister of Poland, who was told about it by the Prime Minister of Hungary. He claims that he will not give us Mr. Romanowski. So we will have a government in exile. Because it was announced that many will find shelter in Hungary.

title: Judiciary Crisis: How to Break the Impasse
description: At the threshold of 2025, we have two dimensions of justice: the one recognized by the president and PiS, and the one treated as legal by those in power.

title: Characters 2024: Antoni Dudek
description: Professor Antoni Dudek as a commentator and podcaster helps us understand reality – so as not to be afraid of it.

title: "The Blot and the Invention of Filip Golarz": A Parable of the Mystery
description: The creators of the new adventures of Ambroży Kleks ask key questions about the relationship between faith and reason and the importance of memory. They arise in a world that delegates more and more decisions to machines, including those directly affecting our lives.

title: Tusk's Slalom. Will the coalition leader be able to lead it to victory once again in 2025?
description: Planning is not the prime minister's strong point; he is not the owner of "cabinets full of laws", but rather a master of improvisation, adapting actions to public moods.

title: Biernacki: How to solve the migration crisis on the border with Belarus?
description:
From time to time we hear journalists pressing politicians with the question: is a wall on the border with Belarus necessary? One might get the impression that this wall, in the opinion of the questioners, is the main remedy for the border crisis. Of course it is not and as such it will not solve any crisis. A wall is a classic medicine that treats symptoms, not the cause. I hope that finally a journalist will ask the right question, more or less like the one in the title of the article. Agency – USA and...

Article Biernacki: How to solve the migration crisis on the border with Belarus? comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Waćkowski: The Crown of Kings. The Jagiellonians – a Eurasian Production
description:
For many years, I have voluntarily watched only sports broadcasts on traditional Polish-language television. However, I made an exception and watched every episode of the series Korona królów. Jagiellonowie. The series shows the fate of King Władysław Jagiełło from the death of his first wife Jadwiga of Anjou to the first years of the reign of his son Władysław of Varna. A Lost Eurasian Opportunity For centuries, Poles have had a complex about Russia. The lost fight for primacy had a large impact on Poles' complexes towards Russia...

Article Waćkowski: Korona królów. Jagiellonowie – Eurasian production comes from Myśl Polska.

title: Rosłoniec: Pasolini – an ambiguous creator
description:
For the majority whose taste has been shaped by Hollywood aesthetics, the mass aesthetic of course, with all its consequences in rebuilding the system of values ​​and lifestyle, at least for show, Pier Paolo Pasolini will remain alien, repulsive, boring, crazy, at best, incomprehensible. Those who today opportunistically put the name of the Italian director, novelist, poet, painter, essayist on their banners in the fight for the colorful and smiling world of a thousand genders have probably not even come close to his work, if we exclude the supposedly ennobling knowledge taken from Wikipedia....

The article Rosłoniec: Pasolini – a non-obvious creator comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Zinkiewicz: Bad news for seniors
description:
At the end of last year, in December, NATO Secretary General Mark Rutte stated that in connection with the threat coming from the East, it was necessary to increase the financial involvement of NATO member states in armaments. He indicated cuts in social spending as potential sources of increasing NATO financing. He also announced a possible reduction in pensions by 1/4 of their current value in these countries. Even more for armaments On December 12, 2024, during a conference organized by the think tank Carnegie Europe,...

The article Zinkiewicz: Bad news for seniors comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Germany does not need the EU to survive
description:
Interview with Alice Weidel, Chairwoman of the Alternative for Germany Ms. Weidel, thank you for agreeing to talk to “The American Conservative.” In a recent interview with Bloomberg, you mentioned that you are a libertarian on the issue of taxes and the war in Ukraine. And yet in Germany you are considered a far-right politician because of your position on immigration and your position on the EU. To clarify, are you in favor of staying in the EU or leaving it, because it is...

The article Germany does not need the EU to survive comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Prayer in the Umayyad Mosque
description:
In my previous article, I hastened to state that the Turkish imperial project has failed. However, two weeks ago, no publicly available information indicated that the Islamists from Idlib would launch a general offensive against al-Assad's Syria and that they would overthrow that state within a week and a half. The capture of the former Umayyad capital of Hayat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) by the militants is completely changing the geopolitical landscape of the Middle East. As Turkish columnist Jusuf Kaplan wrote, the takeover by militias controlled and trained by the Turkish secret services...

The article Prayer in the Umayyad Mosque comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Who opened Pandora's box in the East?
description:
"Ukraine separated from Russia will undoubtedly make a great career. But will the Ukrainians benefit from it?" Roman Dmowski, 1930 The thought of an extraordinary politician, formulated a long time ago, was confirmed after almost a hundred years. And although the Ukrainian nation is not to blame for its own misfortune, which is being entangled in an absurd war with its Russian neighbor, one should have faith and hope that in Kiev too there will come a time for rational reflection – for understanding who is the real perpetrator of the mutual slaughter...

The article Who opened Pandora's box in the East? comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Biden honors Soros
description:
It is an American tradition for a departing president to award people important to his policies with the Presidential Medal of Freedom. This medal is a certificate confirming the commitment to the ideological activities of the departing president. Joe Biden did the same. Among the awarded were policymakers, sponsors, celebrities and personalities from the world of culture and sports. Joe Biden himself received the medal from Barack Obama. The Presidential Medal of Freedom is the highest American civilian decoration, awarded to American citizens and foreigners for particularly outstanding contributions to security...

The article Biden awards Soros comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Christmas and New Year's Eve meeting of our community
description:
A Christmas and New Year meeting of the Editorial Office of "Myśl Polska", Polish Thought Clubs and the Association of the Heirs of Polish World War II Combatants took place in Warsaw. The meeting took place on the 86th anniversary of the death of the leader of National Democracy, Roman Dmowski. In addition to those mentioned, representatives of the Roman Dmowski National Foundation and our invited Friends gathered. Most of the editorial office of our magazine was present - editor-in-chief Jan Engelgard, publisher Przemysław Piasta, Mateusz Piskorski, Adam Śmiech, Maciej Motas, Andrzej Szcześniak, Michał Radzikowski, Olaf Swolkeń and the writers of these words...

The article Spotkanie świeczno-New Year's Eve meeting of our community comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: A nightmare that lasts too long
description:
In this article, I will omit the almost daily announcements and comments about the lawlessness that is rampant in Poland. About persecution, harassment, the extermination of cultural institutions, the ruin of public education, brazen lies and persecutions of chosen "game". I want to take a broader view, because the aforementioned abominations fit perfectly into the entire area, caught in the grip of the system that I have long called global, and which uses the hackneyed phrase "liberal democracy" in front of the stupefied crowds. In fact, this pathological system...

The article Nightmare lasting too long comes from the website Myśl Polska.

title: Powerful earthquake in Tibet kills nearly 126 people
description: At least 126 people were killed and 188 injured in a 6.8-magnitude earthquake in Tibet on Tuesday, leaving many trapped in the rubble of buildings, China's Xinhua news agency reported. Earlier, it had reported 95 dead and 130 injured.

title: What about drivers without a license? The checking process will be automated
description: In the coming days, and certainly by the end of January, the process of checking data regarding driving licenses by entrepreneurs will be automated, announced Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digitization Krzysztof Gawkowski on Tuesday.

title: Sparrows are popular birds, but there are fewer and fewer of them and they are counting on our help. How to care for sparrows and sparrows and how do these birds differ?
description: The house sparrow and its smaller cousin, the tree sparrow, are considered exceptionally common birds, but in reality, they are becoming increasingly rare. They have been with humans for thousands of years and are found mainly in our neighborhood. Find out what sparrows eat, whether they migrate for the winter, and how to help these birds, because they are becoming rarer.

title: Who will replace Science Minister Dariusz Wieczorek? Three names are being mentioned. The Left will make a decision this week
description: This week, New Left politicians are to make a decision on a candidate for the new Minister of Science; Karolina Zioło-Pużuk and Marcin Kulasek remain on the list – PAP has learned unofficially from sources close to the party. MP Dorota Olko is also to be considered.

title: Poland's jumps in crisis. "It's not that bad"
description: Tadeusz Szostak-Berda believes that Polish ski jumping is not as bad as it is presented to fans. "Since Paweł Wąsek was "our" in the Four Hills Tournament, it means that all it takes is the right work, some time and patience" - assessed the long-time FIS judge.

title: New GIS and GIF warnings. These products were withdrawn from stores: Biedronka, Lidl, Auchan, Kaufland, Aldi, Netto, Żabka, POLOmarket: 7.01.2025
description: New GIS warning, valid as of 7/01/2025. Here is a list of products that have been withdrawn by chain stores: Biedronka, Lidl, Netto, Kaufland, POLOmarket, Auchan. Check the new sanitary warning. The list has recently been expanded to include new products and items. Here are the harmful things that stores must remove from their shelves in accordance with the decisions issued by the Chief Sanitary Inspector and the Chief Pharmaceutical Inspectorate. Check the list!

title: This is where Dorota Szelągowska lives. The house of the host of the program Totalne Remonty. How did Katarzyna Grochola's daughter arrange herself? 07.01.2025
description: Dorota Szelągowska loves spending her free time at her home in Warmia. Her estate is located on a picturesque lake. How did Katarzyna Grochola's daughter arrange herself? See photos

title: This is what Jola Rutowicz looks like today! New photos. The Big Brother star showed up again! She looks different
description: This is how Jola Rutowicz has changed, see the latest photos...

title: Is he going to take over the ski jumping team after the season? Apoloniusz Tajner: It's good that he's around
description: The world championships are only in a month and a half. Let's wait and see how they work out for Polish ski jumpers and how the entire season ends. Then we will be able to make a decision about the future of coach Thomas Thurnbichler - says Apoloniusz Tajner, former coach of Adam Małysz and former president of the Polish Ski Association, MP of the Civic Coalition, in an interview with i.pl.

title: See which are the most unlucky vehicle brands
description:
All cars are prone to accidents, but statistically – some are more likely to get into accidents than others. Here is the latest study conducted in this regard by carVertical. The report reveals the brands that have the most bad luck on Polish roads.
The annual carVertrical report is based on the analysis of data from individual vehicle history reports downloaded by drivers who checked their past before buying them in the last 12 months. All data is collected into one whole and analyzed by the system.

title: After the holidays, don't throw it away, just make a home remedy for hypertension and atherosclerosis. It will strengthen the body and improve digestion. Try the recipe
description: Mistletoe is not just a Christmas decoration that gives you a pretext for kissing. This parasitic plant will also come in handy after the holidays, so don't throw it away. It can be used for medicinal purposes. Mistletoe tincture is especially recommended for people with high blood pressure, digestive problems and atherosclerosis. Learn about the valuable properties of mistletoe and try out a simple recipe for mistletoe tincture.

title: He fatally hit a 14-year-old. There is a court decision
description: The court agreed with the prosecutor's request and imposed a three-month detention on Andrzej K., the man who fatally hit a 14-year-old with a bus - said the spokesman for the District Prosecutor's Office in Warsaw, prosecutor Piotr Antoni Skiba. What charges did he face?

title: After almost three and a half hours of marathon play, Chwalińska defeated Czech Salkova in a super tie-break and advanced to the semi-finals of the AO qualifications
description: Maja Chwalińska, seeded 20th in the qualifications, defeated Czech Dominika Salkova 7-6(3), 5-7, 7-6(10) in the quarterfinals of the Australian Open 2025 main draw qualifiers.

title: The Word of the Year 2024 is "coalition", and according to Internet users - "artificial intelligence". The competition is organized by the University of Warsaw
description: By decision of the jury, "coalition" became the Word of the Year 2024. In turn, in the internet voting, "artificial intelligence" won. The competition is organized by the University of Warsaw for the fourteenth time.

title: In this country, they love electric cars. These data leave no doubt
description: A report summarizing the last twelve months was presented by OFV, an organization monitoring the Norwegian automotive market. Never before have combustion cars sold so poorly in Norway - there were fewer than 1,000 of them out of 130,000 total that left Norwegian showrooms in 2024. It is safe to say, however, that Norwegians have fallen in love with electric cars.

title: QUIZ Millionaires and the most searched questions. Can you do it?
Renault Rafale 1.2 E-Tech Full Hybrid 200 HP. Practicality and functionality
description: In the previous part of our test, we described the aesthetic values ​​of the car. It must be admitted that Renault Rafale is one of the most beautiful representatives of compact crossovers, but does aesthetics also go hand in hand with functionality? We checked this during our test.

title: Majchrzak defeated Argentine Trungelliti in the quarterfinals of the Australian Open qualifications after a devastating battle
description: Kamil Majchrzak successfully started the qualifications for the main draw of the Australian Open 2025 on hard courts. In the first round, he defeated the 141st in the world ranking, Argentine Marco Trungelliti, 3:6, 7:6(4), 6:3.

title: Almost empty ski slopes and no traffic jams. This is what Szczyrk was like in the Polish People's Republic. Here is a popular tourist resort in the Silesian Beskids years ago
description: Szczyrk is one of the most popular tourist and recreation centers in the Silesian Beskids. Like Wisła or Ustroń, Szczyrk is located relatively close to the Silesian agglomeration, which has ensured its constantly growing popularity. The chairlift to Skrzyczne has been attracting many tourists eager for mountain views for years. What did Szczyrk look like in the Polish People's Republic? We invite you for a historical walk.

title: Avoid these foods. They are extremely carcinogenic! These foods increase your risk of cancer [07.01.2025]
description: Our diet can increase the risk of cancer - we can say that with certainty. Scientific studies indicate exactly which products are better to avoid if we want to stay healthy. What not to eat so as not to increase the risk of cancer? See our gallery for a list of the most carcinogenic products.

title: Controversial investment in Warsaw. "How will Trzaskowski explain this?"
description: Zbigniew Ziobro writes to Rafał Trzaskowski regarding the Museum of Modern Art building. The politician indicates that the investment costs may have been incredibly overstated.

title: Vikings in Central Poland. DNA tests confirm their presence
description: For several decades, researchers have assumed that Vikings appeared in the central part of today's Poland. The latest research results from Lutomiersk, located near Łódź, confirm this thesis beyond any doubt.

title: Chinese giant added to Washington's list of military companies
description: Washington has added Tencent to the list of companies linked to China's military. What does this mean in practice?

title: Musk's Bad Intelligence: Another Country's Establishment Expresses Dissatisfaction
description: The spokesman for the government in Madrid from the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party joins the chorus of those dissatisfied with the lack of censorship on Elon Musk's X.

title: Fatal poll for Zelensky. Results so bad haven't been seen since the beginning of the war
description: The number of Ukrainians who trust Volodymyr Zelensky is decreasing. The Ukrainian president has the worst result in a trust poll since the beginning of the war.

title: Michalkiewicz: Tusk wants to overpower Poland, like in the 18th century
description: It is about dismantling the Polish state, to bring it to a state of overpowerment, like in the 18th century – says publicist Stanisław Michalkiewicz in an interview with DoRzeczy.pl.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Microsoft's Big Investment in Asia
description: Microsoft will invest $3 billion in the Asian country in its artificial intelligence potential.

title: "Don't make a fool of yourself." Czarnek responds to Nowacka
description: Minister of National Education Barbara Nowacka announced that the ministry she heads is working on a report on the activities of Przemysław Czarnek as the head of the Ministry of Education and Science. The PiS politician reacted quickly to her words.

title: A series of "accidents" at sea. A "shadow fleet" has been spotted in the Baltic Sea
description: The anchor of a tanker suspected of belonging to the Russian "shadow fleet" has been dropped from the Baltic Sea, the Swedish military reports.

title: The Intrigues of the Luxembourger. How He Tried to Divide Witold and Jagiełło
description: The intrigues of Sigismund of Luxembourg caused the original purpose of convening the summit in Lutsk to be blurred among other matters.

title: The ministry wants to fight "disinformation". Skalik: Declared democrats
description: Declared democrats do not understand the point of the discussion – Włodzimierz Skalik points out, referring to the announcements of the Ministry of Climate regarding censorship of critical content.

title: Robbery in Warsaw. In the background an international criminal group
description: At the end of December last year, in the Westfield Mokotów shopping center in Warsaw, before 11 a.m., there was a robbery in one of the jewelry boutiques. The police have a new lead in the case. It turns out that an international criminal group may be behind the robbery.

title: EU-Mercosur agreement. Zalewska: I don't see Tusk building a blocking minority
description: Poland, which has the presidency, will have to convene summits and call for votes. What's more, as a country with a negotiating majority, we should keep an eye on the blocking minority - says PiS MEP Anna Zalewska in an interview with the DoRzeczy.pl portal.

title: Morawiecki's unusual promise: A box of wine for the one who finds my signature
description: Mateusz Morawiecki swears that as prime minister he did not sign the Green Deal. The politician promised a case of wine for the person who finds his signature under the document.

title: Jean-Marie Le Pen is dead. The French politician was 96 years old
description: Jean-Marie Le Pen has died. The French politician, founder and long-time leader of the National Front was 96 years old. In the last years of his life, he struggled with serious health problems.

title: This year belonged to TV Republika. Results published
description: The viewership results for Polish TV stations in 2024 have been published. TV Republika was second to none.

title: Unofficially: Zandberg is a presidential candidate. He is supposed to attack Tusk
description: Adrian Zandberg will run in the presidential election - according to unofficial media reports. The formal decision of the Left Together members is to be made on Friday evening.

title: When Will Interest Rates Be Cut? Goldman Sachs Forecast for Poland
description: Goldman Sachs expects a larger scale of interest rate cuts than market valuations. According to the bank, the reference rate in Poland will fall to 4.25 percent this year.

title: Unemployment data for Europe released. Poland tops the table
description: The unemployment rate in Poland in November 2024 was 3 percent. Only the Czech Republic recorded a lower result.

title: 14-year-old hit by car dies. InPost CEO responds to "false allegations"
description: The driver suspected of fatally hitting a 14-year-old in Wola was not associated with InPost, said Rafał Brzoska, the company's president.

title: 'He takes his faith seriously.' Catholic hierarch at Trump's inauguration
description: New York Archbishop Timothy Cardinal Dolan will lead President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural prayer on January 20. The Cardinal made the announcement during an interview with local news channel WPIX 24.

title: The Central Statistical Office has provided new data on foreigners on the Polish market. This group dominates
description: The share of foreigners in the total number of employed persons amounted to 6.8 percent at the end of July 2024, the Central Statistical Office (GUS) reported. At the end of July last year, there were 1,041.6 thousand foreigners working - of which 405.4 thousand foreigners performed contracts of mandate and related contracts.

title: What do a weaving mill and a swastika have in common? This item has intrigued researchers
description: Norwegian archaeologists have found an interesting object in a medieval weaving mill. Why was it decorated in such an unusual way?

title: Tougher penalties for drivers. Deputy minister reveals details
description: The government wants to tighten the regulations on drivers who break the court's driving ban. Deputy Minister of Justice Arkadiusz Myrcha presented the details of the proposal.

title: Ukrainian soldiers deserted during training in NATO country
description: Several dozen Ukrainian soldiers trained in France deserted during exercises, the AFP agency reported, citing a French army officer.

title: Nawrocki about Prof. Dudek: He called me regarding a doctoral student

title: Telegram's policy about to change? Data goes to services
description: At the end of August 2024, the whole world heard about the arrest of the founder and head of the Telegram messenger, Pavel Durov. It took place at Le Bourget airport near Paris. As we described in CyberDefence24, the man [was accused](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/durov-uslyszal-wstepne-zarzuty-dwa-z-nich-dotycza-dzieciecej-pornografii) of **complicity in, among other things, the distribution of pornographic content with minors or drug trafficking. He was also supposed to refuse to cooperate with the services**, which requested the disclosure of data of platform users breaking the law.

title: NIK will check the “Cybersafe local government” program
description: NIK has planned 90 [audits covering key areas of public life](https://www.nik.gov.pl/aktualnosci/plan-pracy-nik-2025.html) – from the security and financial stability of the state to health and environmental protection. It also concerns the control of the implementation of the state budget and monetary policy assumptions in 2024.

title: Porn Blocking Encourages VPN Installation? A Lesson for Poland
description: The New Year is **one of the good times to implement changes in regulations**, as in the case of the [e-Delivery system](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/rewolucyjna-zmiana-koniec-papierowego-awizo) described in CyberDefence24. This applies not only to Poland, but to the entire world. It is also a good time to analyze statistics and observe interesting phenomena.

title: Ukrainian Drones Are a Russian Nightmare: Here's What They Can Do
description: [Drones](https://cyberdefence24.pl/armia-i-sluzby/ukrainskie-wojsko-rekrutuje-do-armii-dronow) have become a permanent part of the landscape of the [war in Ukraine](https://cyberdefence24.pl/armia-i-sluzby/kradziez-dronow-dla-ukrainskiego-wojska). Drones are used by both sides. They are used, among other things, to carry out attacks deep inside enemy territory. Our eastern neighbors are eager to take advantage of the opportunities provided by drones in the [fight against Russia](https://cyberdefence24.pl/armia-i-sluzby/widzia-wojna-rosji-ukrainski-wywiad-ujawnia-nazwiska).

title: More troops on the streets. Command reaches out to the young
description: **Sponsored Content**

title: Change in Meta management
description: Meta's conduct is controversial **not only in the case of content moderation**, as we described on CyberDefence24, among others, in the context of the case of scam ads featuring the image of [Rafał Brzoska and Omena Mensaah](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/scam-na-facebooku-kuriozalna-odpowiedz-mety-na-decyzje-sadu). **The platform has also been accused of content censorship many times** - as it turned out in August, Mark Zuckerberg himself [admitted to such actions](https://cyberdefence24.pl/cyberbezpieczenstwo/cenzura-na-facebooku-zuckerberg-przekazal-wazny-list-w-sprawie).

title: #CyberMagazyn: Ransomware as a Service (RaaS). What does it mean?
description: Nowadays, you don’t need to be an expert in malware development to launch an effective attack. Of course, **both providing and using cybercriminal services such as RaaS are illegal**, which doesn’t mean that such a model is not popular. Ransomware-as-a-service groups also differ from each other, including in their methods of operation and financing methods.

title: Head of CERT Polska: More campaigns using voice and image in 2025
description: The year 2024, which was full of events related to cybersecurity, has ended. On the pages of CyberDefence24, we present summaries and opinions of experts from the cybersecurity industry on the last 12 months. **We also ask about what the beginning of 2025 may bring**.

title: Cybertruck Explodes Outside Trump Hotel, Victim Identified
description: The New Year in the United States began with an attack on a New Year's Eve party in New Orleans, in which 15 people died. A few hours later, in front of the Trump International Hotel in Las Vegas, a Tesla Cybertruck arrived and exploded under the entrance to the building a few seconds later.

title: The US wants to tighten regulations on foreign technology. It's about drones
description: The U.S. Department of Commerce's Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS) issued a statement announcing a **rulemaking proposal to protect the drone information technology supply chain. Specifically, it aims to protect against the U.S.'s biggest adversaries, China and Russia**.

title: What does a driver do during the day? The car manufacturer knows that
description: The problem related to information collected about users has been affecting not only [search engines](https://cyberdefence24.pl/cyberbezpieczenstwo/krystian-lukasik-wyszukiwarki-zbieraja-nasze-dane-polacy-oczekuja-rekompensaty-wideo) or [Facebook](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/niemiecki-urzad-antymonopolowy-ogranicza-dzialalnosc-facebooka-w-zakresie-zbierania-danych) for over a dozen years now,**but also seemingly "ordinary" things**.

title: Siri was recording private conversations
description: The case of **Siri unintentionally recording private conversations** was first revealed [by The Guardian in 2019](https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2019/jul/26/apple-contractors-regularly-hear-confidential-details-on-siri-recordings). According to the daily's informant, it was about both **business transactions, doctor-patient conversations, criminal exchanges and even... recordings of sexual encounters**. Additionally, the company allegedly had information about the user's contact details, applications and location.

title: Photos of faces and documents of over 150 people have appeared on the web
description: The leak affects **152 people from all over the world.** The origin of the files is currently unknown. Cybercriminals have also published photos of documents and faces of three people from Poland.

title: There will be no rest in cybersecurity in 2025
description: Bidding farewell to the old and welcoming the new calendar year prompts us to sum up the last 12 months. In CyberDefence24, we ask experts from the cybersecurity and new technologies industry what they believe were the **biggest challenges or most serious incidents** that occurred in the last year, as well as trends and predictions for the next four quarters.

title: Chrome Add-ons Attack: Malicious Code in Nearly 40 Extensions
description: Problems with browser add-ons are nothing new. As we described on CyberDefence24, [it happened in July](https://cyberdefence24.pl/cyberbezpieczenstwo/malware-w-rozszerzeniu-chrome-w-tle-korea-polnocna), when North Korean hackers prepared a Chrome extension that collected email addresses and email passwords.

title: Robots of the Future: Samsung Bets on Rainbow Robotics
description: In the Korean [company Samsung](https://cyberdefence24.pl/strefa-samsunga-/stacja-galaxy-samsung-podsumowuje-i-edycje-programu) it acquired shares for the first time in 2023 - then it was 14.7% and an investment of 86.8 billion Korean won. Currently, it will increase its share to 35% in Rainbow Robotics**, which will also be included as a subsidiary as part of the consolidation of financial statements - [the Samsung Polska press office reports](https://news.samsung.com/pl/samsung-electronics-zostanie-najwiekszym-udzialowcem-rainbow-robotics-przyspieszajac-prace-nad-robotami-przyszlosci).

title: AI Assistant to Help with Digital Accessibility
description: As part of the European Funds for Social Development 2021-2027 (FERS) programme, the Digital Competence Centre (https://www.gov.pl/web/cyfryzacja/nowy-projekt-ai-dc—-sztuczna-inteligencja-wspierajaca-dostepnosc-cyfrowa) is implementing a project aimed at creating an advanced chatbot.

title: mObywatel source code. What about its publication?
description: The original wording of the [Act on mObywatel](https://isap.sejm.gov.pl/isap.nsf/download.xsp/WDU20230001234/O/D20231234.pdf) in Article 82 assumed **the release of the code within one year of the entry into force of the Act,** which took place on July 14, 2023.

title: Revolutionary change. The end of paper notices?
description: The process of final implementation of the e-Delivery system has been ongoing since 2023 – at that time, in CyberDefence24, we presented [the first announcements](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/co-dalej-z-systemem-e-doreczenia) regarding “**remediation of the situation**”, as the current Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digital Affairs Krzysztof Gawkowski put it. Ultimately, the relevant draft amendment to the act was submitted to the [list of legislative works](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/okres-przejsciowy-dla-e-doreczen-ministerstwo-cyfryzacji-podalo-szczegoly) of the Council of Ministers at the end of July, and the Sejm [adopted it](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/e-doreczenia-coraz-blizej) in the second half of November last year.

title: Wyzwania and TikTok. 10 million dol. kary
description: TikTok didn't have a good run in the world last year. Let's recall that there is an increasing amount of talk about the harmful impact of the app on children's mental health, and seven families in France have sued the company for exposing their children to harmful content. According to the parents, this was supposed to lead to two of their children taking their own lives, [which we wrote more about in this article](https://cyberdefence24.pl/social-media/rodzice-pozywaja-tiktoka-powazne-oskarzenia).

title: Laptop for the teacher. There will be changes
description: [The draft amendment to the regulation of the Minister of Digital Affairs](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/laptopy-dla-nauczycieli-ilu-skorzystalo-z-programu) on the determination of groups of teachers, educators and other pedagogical staff entitled to receive support financed from public funds of December 17, 2024 has been submitted for consultation.

title: A year of blockades in Newag trains is behind us. What do we know today?
description: At the beginning of December 2023, **the public was surprised by publications reporting on blockages that prevented the launch of trains manufactured by Newag after periodic repairs at the Rail Vehicle Service in Inowrocław**. They were discovered in 2022 by specialists from Dragon Sector. This story is the first of its kind in the Polish rail industry - before that, there was no talk of problems unexpectedly encountered by plants dealing with traction vehicle inspections.

title: The Polish EU presidency is starting. Here are the priorities
description: **The Polish Presidency of the EU Council will last until 30 June 2025**. Under the slogan "Security, Europe!" our country has set its priorities for the next six months.

title: Telegram has blocked Russian media channels in Europe.
description: Since the beginning of the invasion of Ukraine, there has been an **open fight against Russian propaganda**, which is most visible through blocking access to local media. As [we described at the time](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/meta-ograniczy-dostep-do-rosyjskich-mediow-w-ue) in CyberDefence24, such a decision was made by Meta on February 28, 2022 in relation to RT (formerly Russia Today) and Sputnik. Two days later, a ban on the distribution of Russian media was introduced throughout the European Union.

title: Poles' personal data leaked from 14-year-old Excel spreadsheet
description: The file was found by sending the appropriate query to the Internet search engine. Such action is referred to as **Google dorking or Google hacking,** which we [described](https://cyberdefence24.pl/technologie/cybermagazyn-zaawansowane-funkcje-wyszukiwarki-google-oto-co-powinienes-wiedziec) on our portal.

title: German government criticizes Musk. "Attempt to influence elections"
description: The political situation in Germany has changed dramatically in recent months – early parliamentary elections will be held there in February. **The fight for voters is also being waged online**, including all the threats.

title: Cyberattack on US telecoms. Number of victims has increased
description: Much has changed since [November reports](https://cyberdefence24.pl/cyberbezpieczenstwo/chiny-atakowaly-amerykanskie-telekomy-celem-zapisy-rozmow-politykow) about the Chinese hacking into commercial telecommunications infrastructure in the United States.

title: Changes at Microsoft Poland. CEO leaves
description: Dominika Bettman joined the [Microsoft](https://cyberdefence24.pl/cyberbezpieczenstwo/globalna-awaria-systemow-a-microsoft-wyjasniamy) team in Poland and **took over the position of CEO [in December 2021](https://news.microsoft.com/pl-pl/2021/10/04/dominika-bettman-na-czele-microsoft-w-polsce/).** She was responsible for all Microsoft activities in Poland, including the implementation of the Polish Digital Valley transformation plan.

title: Major incidents in 2024
description: It’s important to note at the outset that **no two security incidents are the same.** Every organization has many different resources and uses different safeguards. However, there are universal lessons to be learned from every attack** that can be used to improve our defenses.

title: 2024: Fighting Organized Cybercrime
description: **Ireneusz Tarnowski** - Cyber ​​threat analyst with long experience and great imagination. For many years he has been involved in tactical and operational Cyber ​​Threat Intelligence. Analyzing threats in cyberspace and tactics and techniques of cyber attacks, he assesses the offensive capabilities of criminal groups, the potential impact on the organization and develops response plans for emerging attacks. Leader in the area of ​​cyber incident management, where as an incident coordinator for many years he ensured that they were conducted in accordance with the highest standards, often engaging in analyses of the most difficult incidents at the technical level.

title: Russia's Invisible War: Ukrainian Intelligence Reveals Names
description: Ukrainian Military Intelligence (HUR) and the [Center for Combating Disinformation](https://cpd.gov.ua/) have created a **[directory of persons](https://war-sanctions.gur.gov.ua/propaganda/persons) involved in the information war waged by Russia**. The names and descriptions of their activities can be found on the website [war-sanctions.gur.gov.ua](https://war-sanctions.gur.gov.ua/).

title: TikTok Ban: Trump Appeals to Supreme Court
description: TikTok's ongoing fight since spring to invalidate the act [signed by President Biden](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/joe-biden-podpisal-ustawe-ws-tiktoka-i-co-teraz), **showed the platform's desperation to prevent the withdrawal or sale of the American part of the business, in accordance with the law in force since January 19**. In fact, however, the conflict began at the stage of discussions in Congress.

title: Great financial pyramid. More arrests
description: The Management Board of the [Central Bureau for Combating Cybercrime](https://cbzc.policja.gov.pl/) in [Wrocław](https://maps.app.goo.gl/22B2wxBUQSmKb6qx6) is conducting an **investigation into the FutureNet platform's financial pyramid**. As [informs](https://cbzc.policja.gov.pl/bzc/aktualnosci/477,Kolejne-zatrzymania-w-sprawie-FutureNet-90-milionow-zlotych-straty.html), as a result of illegal activity, **over 20,000 people** have been harmed. Losses associated with the procedure amount to **at least PLN 90 million**

title: Ukrainians attacked Russians' communications
description: Ukrainian military intelligence [reports](https://gur.gov.ua/content/zghoriv-fieniks-znyshcheno-telekomunikatsiine-obladnannia-rosiian-na-okupovanii-terytorii-donechchyny.html) about the **destruction of 4 facilities in [Donetsk Oblast](https://maps.app.goo.gl/YkX13xawP3wx3Cj57) where Russian telecommunications equipment was located.** It belonged to the operator "Phoenix", whose services are allegedly used by the occupiers.

title: Will the EU have access to data from our devices in the new year?
description: **Author: Marcin Fic, Demagog Association**

title: Behind the scenes of negotiations with criminals. Debunking the myths
description: [**Cybercrime](https://cyberdefence24.pl/armia-i-sluzby/cyberprzestepczosc-policja-ujawnia-dane) is thriving. Many of you have probably experienced this yourself** when you have been the target of, for example, online fraud, not to mention a cyberattack.

title: In 2024, NIS2 should be implemented differently
description: **Beata Zalewa** has over 18 years of experience in the technology industry. She works as a Lead Technical Architect, creating on-premise and cloud solutions. She specializes in cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, and DevOps. She works with clients to design secure and stable IT environments. Her passion is increasing security through technology. She is also a lecturer, trainer, mentor, speaker, and blogger.

title: Trends for 2025: AI development, arms race, polarization
description: [Marcel Kiełtyka](https://demagog.org.pl/autorzy/marcel-kieltyka/) - since 2016 associated with the first fact-checking organization in Poland Demagog, where he developed his competences as a volunteer, analyst, coordinator and communication and PR specialist. Currently, he serves as a Member of the Management Board and Director of the Communication and PR Department.

title: South Korea Passes AI Regulations. The World's Second Act
description: Since the adoption by the European Union of the [AI Act](https://cyberdefence24.pl/technologie/rada-unii-europejskiej-przyjela-akt-o-sztucznej-inteligencji), the issue of regulation has often been raised in discussions about artificial intelligence – both in terms of its use and development.

title: State Digitalization Strategy. The President of the Office of Personal Data Protection has comments
description: A comprehensive document on Poland's digital development by 2035 [discussed step by step on CyberDefence24.pl.](https://cyberdefence24.pl/strona-tagow/strategia-cyfryzacji-panstwa) We were also present at the summary of consultations, during which the right direction of changes was discussed. Important declarations were made then regarding the ministry's activities in 2025.

title: There is no shortage of volunteers for the cyber police. Recruitment is a challenge
description: During the last meeting of the Administration and Internal Affairs Committee, information was presented, among other things, on the functioning of the [Central Bureau for Combating Cybercrime in the Police](https://cyberdefence24.pl/strona-tagow/centralne-biuro-zwalczania-cyberprzestepczosci).

title: Attack on Polish Music Publishing House. We have a comment
description: Information about the attack appeared on December 17 on the Akira group's blog. So far, cybercriminals have not published the data they obtained from the Polish organization.

title: TikTok in the US. What's Next?
description: The fate of TikTok in the United States has been hanging in the balance since last spring. After [President](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/joe-biden-podpisal-ustawe-ws-tiktoka-i-co-teraz) Joe Biden signed a law banning the platform from operating in the US under the aegis of the Chinese, the app [is fighting in the courts](https://cyberdefence24.pl/polityka-i-prawo/zakaz-tiktoka-w-usa-sad-apelacyjny-orzekl-w-sprawie) to declare the adopted regulations unconstitutional.

title: Cybersecurity in 2024. "Not good"
description: As part of our year-end summary, we asked industry experts about the most important trends, most significant incidents and greatest challenges in the last 12 months.

title: EU Security. What Does Poland Want to Teach Europe?
description: Last Thursday (i.e. December 19 this year), a press conference was held with the participation of Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Digitization [Krzysztof Gawkowski](https://www.gov.pl/web/premier/krzysztof-gawkowski) and Deputy Ministers [Dariusz Standerski](https://www.gov.pl/web/cyfryzacja/dariusz-standerski2) and [Rafał Rosiński](https://www.gov.pl/web/cyfryzacja/rafal-rosinski). During the briefing, the ministry officially presented the digital priorities of the [Polish Presidency of the Council of the European Union](https://www.gov.pl/web/premier/program-polskiej-prezydencji-w-radzie-ue), which starts on January 1, 2025.** You can find the points discussed in detail in the material: [Polish Presidency of the EU. We have learned about digital priorities](https://cyberdefence24.pl/cyberbezpieczenstwo/polska-prezydencja-w-ue-poznajmy-cyfrowe-priorytety).

title: LockBit developer awaits extradition to the US
description: The fight of international services against LockBit has been going on for a long time, but this year there has been clear progress.
